artist: Artist: Taguchi Beisaku; Publisher: Mizuno Asajirō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; man in center, on knees with a bleeding wound on head; soldier in a black military uniform looking down at wounded figure on right; third figure on left, wearing a hand, robe, face obscured and a handbag and sheathed sword strapped to figure; low stone wall on left; blue sky with hazy smoke rising in background; roof of buildings faintly on left behind left figure
inscription: on right sheet, on back, in pencil, in top center: {illegible} | on right sheet, on back, in ULC, in pencil: 17 | on left sheet, on back, in URC, in pencil: 17
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Picture of a Prisoner Giving up Military Secrets Prompted by Major Saitō’s Kindness and Affection
